top_comments.comment: Want THREE (3) Masters booster boxes (2015, 2017, and Ultimate)? It's the Triple Masters giveaway! Just donate in multiples of $4.00 to Trans Lifeline below and I will send one donor ALL THREE boxes on Oct 30 at 6pm PST! I'll mail worldwide! But there's also 45 additional MTG prizes going out to 45 additional donors! You can see the full list here: https://twitter.com/TolarianCollege/status/1454226004130426884?s=20 and you just need to donate in $4 multiples. Each $4 is another chance to get a cool prize! Donate---> https://secure.givelively.org/donate/trans-lifeline/tolarian-community-college-1

comments_since_last_sample.body:
me when kawigawa spoilers start up:
"Splice is just kicker you can put onto other cards."
this video made me laugh so deep

I've been playing Magic for nearly 20 years, and... I have no idea what to do with this knowledge.

I feel like I just saw the face of Heliod and it was just source code.
Waited for "entwine", one of the most kicker mechanics, but it never came.
I always thought every mechanic was either kicker or split cards
I needed this video in my life.
Storm is just a Kicker cost of having already cast spells that turn
"Stax and mass land-destruction", my two favorite things in edh...... 😳🤣🤣

This video is a Kicker!
Kicker! Kicker! Kicker! Kicker! Kicker! Kicker! Kicker! Kicker!
Omg this video almost just confused me about MtG.. great..

I get no kick from Kalain
Mere Cavern of Souls doesn't thrill me at all
So tell me why should it be true
That I get a kick out of Grunn
Training. Mentor. It's just kicker but attacking is what you gives you the kicker bonus
Kicker and Horsemanship changed my life
